attributes.action: Give NHS  recognition for there hard work and upgrade them to Royal NHS
attributes.additional_details:
After watching the Andrew Mars show when he said “when all this started we went out and clapped, they now deserve far more than that”. 
So as a member of The Royal British Legion who received Royal status and the end of WW2 for what they did for troops returning from war, I believe that all the members of the NHS have shown dedication and commitment well above and beyond any expectations, And therefore deserves recognition for what they have achieved and to that end I believe they should become ROYAL NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE.
attributes.background:
In light of the recent pandemic one is left in awe of the commitment and achievements of all of the NHS staff. 
So obviously as monetary funds are not available to pay then what they deserve, then they should be given Royal status to become the Royal National Health Service.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Rename the NHS to "The Royal National Health Service"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568720
